main.name: Sara McGuinn
main.description: Recent grad of Northwestern full-stack web development boot camp. Professional with 10+ years of experience in international higher education.
main.bio: Sara is a Senior Study Abroad Program Manager at the Northwestern Global Learning Office, part of the Buffett Institute for Global Affairs. A proud alumna of Northwestern, Sara studied abroad for a full year in Seville, Spain as an undergraduate and received her BA in Spanish. After completing her MA in Applied Linguistics at the University of Massachusetts Boston, she tutored Spanish and taught English as a second language (ESL) for several years before returning to Northwestern, this time as a staff member. Currently, she is part of the leadership team of International Educators of Illinois, where she co-coordinates the association's mentorship program. When not at work, she love spending time with her husband and kids, playing games, listening to live music, watching sports, reading...and of course, coding.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to get in touch - I'd love to hear from you.

education.degree: Full Stack Web Development Boot Camp

work.title: Senior Study Abroad Program Manager
work.description: Manage portfolio of international programs, advise outbound and inbound undergraduate exchange students, develop application platform solutions
